body: Interviu Online:1.  Name three action-adventure games that you like.2.  What is your favorite combat sequence happening in one of the three games you have listed above? (e.g. a shootout during the first heist mission in GTA 5, the griffin boss battle in The Witcher 3...)3.  What makes this combat sequence fun? (e.g. NPC placement/setup, player choices...)
title: Junior Mission Designer
locations: Strada Emanoil Porumbaru nr.77 Sector 1, București, Municipiul București, România
